name: PreviewLayout
desc: A size constraint for a preview.

items.name: case device
items.desc: Center the preview in a container the size of the device on which the preview is running.

items.name: case fixed(width: CGFloat, height: CGFloat)
items.desc: Center the preview in a fixed size container with the given dimensions.

items.name: case sizeThatFits
items.desc: Fit the container to the size of the preview when offered the size of the device that the preview is running on.
